| A tiny pseudodragon:* has no hands.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* can be [tamed by feeding](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic").
* wanders randomly.
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                                                                                                                   |

A **tiny pseudodragon**, D, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is a [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") and [domestic](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic") [dragon-like](/index.php?title=Dragon_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Dragon (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") creature that is the most basic stage of [pseudodragon](/wiki/Pseudodragon "Pseudodragon"). Tiny pseudodragons have a tendency to wander, will pick up [gold](/wiki/Gold "Gold") and [gems](/wiki/Gem "Gem"), and can be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").

A tiny pseudodragon has a bite attack and a weak [breath weapon](/wiki/Breath_weapon "Breath weapon") similar to that of [half-dragons](/wiki/Half-dragon "Half-dragon").

## Generation

Tiny pseudodragons are not randomly generated. A tiny pseudodragon can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into a [pseudodragon](/wiki/Pseudodragon_\(dNetHack\) "Pseudodragon (dNetHack)").

All half-dragon characters in roles other than the [Anachrononaut](/wiki/Anachrononaut "Anachrononaut"), [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict"), [Knight](/wiki/Knight "Knight"), [Madperson](/wiki/Madperson "Madperson"), and [Noble](/wiki/Noble "Noble") start the game with a tiny pseudodragon.

## Origin

Pseudodragons originate from *[Dungeons & Dragons](/wiki/Dungeons_%26_Dragons "Dungeons & Dragons")*, where they resemble true dragons in appearance but are usually far smaller and far more docile, which makes them suitable as familiars for wizards. They do not usually grow to the sizes shown in dNetHack and notdNetHack, which rivals that of the true dragons in those variants.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Tiny_pseudodragon\&action=edit)*

html:
Tiny pseudodragon

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
D tiny pseudodragon (No tile)
Difficulty 4
Attacks Bite 1d4 physical, Breath weapon 1d1 half-dragon breath
D tiny pseudodragon (No tile)
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Bite 1d4 physical, Breath weapon 1d1 half-dragon breath

Base level 2
Base experience 31
Speed 15
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment -5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 50
Nutritional value 50
Size tiny

A tiny pseudodragon:

  • has no hands.
  • is carnivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can be seen through infravision.

A tiny pseudodragon, D, is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is a carnivorous and domestic dragon-like creature that is the most basic stage of pseudodragon. Tiny pseudodragons have a tendency to wander, will pick up gold and gems, and can be seen via infravision.

A tiny pseudodragon has a bite attack and a weak breath weapon similar to that of half-dragons.

Generation

Tiny pseudodragons are not randomly generated. A tiny pseudodragon can grow up into a pseudodragon.

All half-dragon characters in roles other than the Anachrononaut, Convict, Knight, Madperson, and Noble start the game with a tiny pseudodragon.

Origin

Pseudodragons originate from Dungeons & Dragons, where they resemble true dragons in appearance but are usually far smaller and far more docile, which makes them suitable as familiars for wizards. They do not usually grow to the sizes shown in dNetHack and notdNetHack, which rivals that of the true dragons in those variants.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Tiny_pseudodragon&oldid=161642"

A '''tiny pseudodragon''', {{brown|D}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. It is a [[carnivorous]] and [[domestic]] [[Dragon (dNetHack)|dragon-like]] creature that is the most basic stage of [[pseudodragon]]. Tiny pseudodragons have a tendency to wander, will pick up [[gold]] and [[gem]]s, and can be seen via [[infravision]].

A tiny pseudodragon has a bite attack and a weak [[breath weapon]] similar to that of [[half-dragon]]s.

==Generation==
Tiny pseudodragons are not randomly generated. A tiny pseudodragon can [[grow up]] into a [[Pseudodragon (dNetHack)|pseudodragon]].

All half-dragon characters in roles other than the [[Anachrononaut]], [[Convict]], [[Knight]], [[Madperson]], and [[Noble]] start the game with a tiny pseudodragon.

==Origin==
Pseudodragons originate from ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'', where they resemble true dragons in appearance but are usually far smaller and far more docile, which makes them suitable as familiars for wizards. They do not usually grow to the sizes shown in dNetHack and notdNetHack, which rivals that of the true dragons in those variants.
